name: Magic Escape - Yo.Doggies
description:
Get ready for a spooktacular adventure because we're thrilled to introduce our very first puzzle game!
In this enchanting experience, you'll team up with three cute doggies on a special escape journey. Follow the magical book's lead through a world full of wonders and mysteries. Brew the witch's potion using special ingredients to discover hidden secrets. Solve tricky puzzles, find hidden treasures, and have a blast with your furry pals!
